day-1.title: Safe Space
day-1.description: This hypnosis creates safety so your mind and body can explore honestly without pressure.

day-2.title: Las Vagus
day-2.description: Today's session activates your vagus nerve to naturally produce the calm you've been seeking.

day-3.title: Olivia and the White Fox
day-3.description: This playful story invites your unconscious mind to discover new possibilities through imagination.

day-4.title: Bread and Cheese and Rock and Roll
day-4.description: Celebrate life's simple pleasures and reconnect with satisfaction that comes from presence, not excess.

day-5.title: HealthNow Express
day-5.description: Discover how your body naturally creates joy, connection, and calm without chemical assistance.

day-6.title: Shame and Guilt and Inner Voice
day-6.description: See shame and guilt with compassion as passing clouds that don't define the sky.

day-7.title: A Walk in the Park
day-7.description: Sometimes transformation just needs a gentle pause and permission to rest.

day-8.title: The Drill Sergeant
day-8.description: This session honors your strength and helps focused discipline build lasting new patterns.

day-9.title: Friendly Fox
day-9.description: Return to the wisdom of your body's natural healing and the science of moderation.

day-10.title: Las Vagus
day-10.description: As withdrawal symptoms peak, let your vagus nerve restore balance and trust in your body's healing.

day-11.title: Saying No Country Style
day-11.description: Learn that saying no is actually saying yes to what truly matters to you.

day-12.title: Olivia and the White Fox
day-12.description: Revisit this story as you master urge surfing and notice emotions before thoughts take over.

day-13.title: HealthNow Express
day-13.description: Rediscover natural highs as you practice kindness and strengthen your connection to authentic joy.

day-14.title: Building the Bridge
day-14.description: Build connections within yourself and with others, one intentional step at a time.

day-15.title: A Walk in the Park
day-15.description: Practice patience with your transformation as this session helps you rest in your own timing.

day-16.title: A Little Help For Your Friends
day-16.description: Explore how authentic kindness creates connections that no drink ever could.

day-17.title: The Drill Sergeant
day-17.description: Call on your inner discipline to build habits that honor your commitment and values.

day-18.title: Safe Space
day-18.description: Integrate 18 days of growth as hypnotherapy and journaling work together to rewire old patterns.

day-19.title: The Old City
day-19.description: Journey to discover the wisdom waiting in the walled garden of your heart.

day-20.title: Fear
day-20.description: Acknowledge fear without letting it drive your choices as you learn you're already safe.

day-21.title: Inner Compass
day-21.description: Find the compass inside you that always points toward your deepest truth.

day-22.title: Inner Guidance
day-22.description: Get quiet enough to hear the inner voice that's been waiting to guide you.

day-23.title: Shame and Guilt and Inner Voice
day-23.description: Release denial's hold by seeing yourself with compassion and listening to your inner wisdom.

day-24.title: Dealing with Anger
day-24.description: Understand anger as information rather than enemy and respond with wisdom, not reaction.

day-25.title: Las Vagus
day-25.description: Support your blood pressure and nervous system as your body continues healing from the inside out.

day-26.title: Building the Bridge
day-26.description: Strengthen bridges of authentic connection as you explore relationships without alcohol's filter.

day-27.title: Bread and Cheese and Rock and Roll
day-27.description: Celebrate hangover-free mornings by reconnecting with simple pleasures that sustain real joy.

day-28.title: A Walk in the Park
day-28.description: Ground yourself in this moment as you process both internal and external stress with clarity.

day-29.title: Inner Compass
day-29.description: Let your inner compass guide you back to your core values as you prepare for tomorrow's choice.

day-30.title: The Secret Formula
day-30.description: This session reveals how early patterns shaped your choices and honors the wisdom you've gained.

hypnosis-adventure-done-modal-descriptio: Your unconscious mind is doing the deep work. Keep showing up.
